name: CHROMA (PRJCT_CTRSS)
description:
Welcome To CHROMA. The latest  PRJCT from OSAKA PRODUCTIONS!


Synopsis: you play Ashe, an enthusiastic inventor who dreams of merging the lines between the virtual and real worlds. After incorrectly diagnosing a bug in her prototypes code, testing avatars have escaped and are now wreaking havoc across the town. 

As the player you must traverse the town, destroy all avatars you find in the hopes of returning to work on your impossible dream.

Hope you Enjoy the Demo, see if you can beat my Hi-score. Happy Hunting!

-Osamu

CONTROLS:
WASD: Moves character Left, Right, Foward and Backwards.
Q: Makes Ashe deal a Light Attack
E: Makes Ashe deal a Heavy Attack

1: Switches Debug tool to "LOOP"

  • (A Slow Tool that allows Ashe to punch harder (per punch) and sustain more damage, at the cost of a slower punch rate and movement. Emphasis on using Heavy Attacks. )

2: Switches Debug tool to "NONE" 

  • (A balanced tool with little to no drawbacks.)

3: Switches Debug tool to "CRUSH" 

  • (A Fast Tool that allows Ashe to punch and move at a faster rate harder, at the cost of lower damage (per punch) and defence. Emphasis on using Light Attacks. )
    Esc/P: Pauses Game, Shows Pause Menu
